description:
Torigaya is Washizu`s only friend until Washizu started opening himself to other people. He usually acts cocky and arrogant when he is with Washizu. He is very fond of children. In the anime, he unusually (and unexplainably) shrinks, which only Washizu notices.
In the end of the anime, he unexplainably becomes a girl, which was extremely shocking to Washizu.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Torigaya Keita
